statements: SELECT * FROM StudentInterests WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM StudentInterests WHERE interest1 = 'Music';
SELECT student_id, email FROM StudentInterests WHERE date_of_birth > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM StudentInterests ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM StudentInterests ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentInterests WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM StudentInterests WHERE last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM StudentInterests WHERE interest1 = 'Programming' AND interest2 = 'Design';
SELECT * FROM StudentInterests WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1995-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM StudentInterests WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level < 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT student_id, interest, level_of_interest FROM interests WHERE level_of_interest >= 3;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN interests ON students.student_id = interests.student_id ORDER BY students.name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY name ASC, student_id DESC
SELECT student_id, name FROM students WHERE grade_level = 12 ORDER BY grade_level DESC
SELECT s.name, i.interest FROM students s INNER JOIN interests i ON s.student_id = i.student_id WHERE i.level_of_interest > 70 ORDER BY s.name ASC
SELECT * FROM students WHERE gender = 'M' AND age < 25 ORDER BY age ASC, name DESC
SELECT s.name, s.age, i.interest FROM students s LEFT JOIN interests i ON s.student_id = i.student_id WHERE i.interest = 'Music' ORDER BY s.age DESC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, name, age FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_id, name, age, gender FROM Students WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT interest FROM Interests WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age FROM Students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, department FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(interest) AS num_interests FROM Interests GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_interests > 3;
SELECT * FROM Students INNER JOIN Interests ON Students.student_id = Interests.student_id WHERE interest = 'Programming';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT student_id, interest_description FROM interests WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, name, age, gender FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, interest_description FROM interests JOIN students ON interests.student_id = students.student_id WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT course_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback JOIN courses ON feedback.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING avg_rating > 4 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, instructor, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, interest_category FROM students JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id;
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM student_responses JOIN courses ON student_responses.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE LENGTH(course_description) > 100;
SELECT student_name, interest_category FROM students JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id WHERE interest_category = 'Science';
SELECT course_name, instructor, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM program_planning WHERE planning_date >= '2022-01-01');
SELECT student_name, course_name, interest_level FROM students JOIN student_responses ON students.student_id = student_responses.student_id WHERE interest_level > 3;
